google_play_reviews.content: Just what the doctor ordered
Best QR scanner in existence
Does its job perfectly. No unnecessary permissions required.
Wow that's nice
Best on the play store. Ease to use, simple, no ads. Private friendly. Thank you.
Very happy with this app
Very simple and straightforward app. No ads. Must download. They're also FOSS so you can trust it.
Best free scanner l've seen. Scans bar codes and QR codes well on my Android 10. Lots of options for dealing with results (copy/share/search). This is v. 4.0.1.
Application fails to scan QR and if I manually select QR age the app crashes with a message instantly.
Simply the best QR code scanner, with all the features I need.
Nice
Super useful, private and secure!
Simply the best code scanner app ! And it's open source, which is why I chose it in the first time. Its features make it the best app in the code scanning field.

Being privacy friendly is certainly a great virtue but the app would have been more useful to me if it allowed scanning pictures already present in my gallery. Maybe,being privacy friendly contradicts being able to scan gallery pictures ; then it's understandable.
good and no ads

google_play_reviews.userName: wer ist Wikus van der Merwe
google_play_reviews.content: Used to work, but now crashes as soon as it sees a QR. Maybe it has anxiety... ðŸ¤”ðŸ˜…
FantÃ¡stica. Todas las apps deberÃ­an ser asÃ­ de respetuosas con la privacidad.

Suits my needs perfectly. I love that it does nothing with the scanned content before I have the chance to check it. It gives me the control. Often I just want to scan something like a serial number from a bar code and copy to the clipboard - it can do that too. The only problem is that it has tends to have difficulty focussing the camera and detecting the code. I sometimes need to adjust the position and/or distance, rarely I need a second attempt. But it always gets there in the end.
Finally, an app to replace ZXing without invading the tiny remaining sliver of my online privacy. Thank you!
Great app, zero tracking. Fantastic. And it is open source code.

Wonderful app. Small size, minimum permissions, open source (GPL V3), and it Just Works! At various points in the past I've needed to install a QR-code scanner. As the developer of this app notes, the Play Store is full of various scanner apps of varying degrees of scrupulosity. I think I once installed one that was around 80 MB. ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤¨ðŸ§ I imagine many phones these days have a QR-scanner integrated somehow, but it is often lacking. If you need more features then I highly recommend this app!
No annoying ads
Best QR Code reader out there. Privacy oriented, great features and very lightweight
Simple, light, respectful of privacy. Works well. Five stars!
Slow to focus. Couldn't find Barcode item online. Said "no search app". Qr code uses duckduckgo not the default on phone.
Does not scan and crashes when storing a generated code.
Works as expected.
5 stars for your permissions policy. We need more apps like this.
Doesn't ask for a crazy amount of permissions and it works.
It's simple to use. Just wish it had zoom in/out features to scan.
Lacks alot of features
Thanks a lot! Works fine
Great app. No ads, no data transfer. Only thing missing for me is the feature to enlarge the scanned qr code. It's possible to scan in the history, but fullscreen on click would be great
Perfect! Other apps require invasive permissions, this one does not.
Very bad
I can scan and generate URIs now, without granting unnecessary permissions. (v3.1.0)
Functions well
too many clicks before and after scan

It scans codes, and lets you save them. But you can't do much with the saved codes. It stores the version, error correction level, and mask, but doesn't display them to the user. You also can't bring up the saved codes full screen for somebody to scan. Generator can't do text QR codes, and crashes if I try to store a generated code.
Nice! No ads, no unnecessary permissions!
Very simple, only one permission, that's good
This app is fantastic. Minumal permissions are required and it warns you about dangerous sites before opening. I cannot reccomend it enough!
Easy to use, does not use your data / permission inappropriately
What a relief! I went through ten other scanner apps, but all of them had turned treacherous. This one works simply and well; and there can be no higher praise for a piece of software.
Great app without useless features or ads... But please fix the beep on scan (disable doesn't work). Thx!
Works well and straightforward to use but it beeps loudly when a QR code is scanned when Do Not Disturb is set and history doesn't seem to be working (only non-visited codes are in history)
Thanks so much for providing an easy to use, privacy friendly, and ad free app for free. Please fix the beep on scan though. It is off in the settings, but still beeps quite loudly.

For some reason beep signal setting is not working (can't turn off the signal). Still, application is awesome. It just does what it meant to do without useless features and ads. Best option on whole play market for sure!
The only app which won't ask to access your filesystem. Good work, meine Genossen!
Can't scan saved images. Useless. No dark theme. Can't just copy the recognized text to the buffer.
Nice
Clean app focused on functionality
Very simple interface.no ads at all.problem is that after scanning qr and showing url app and clicking proceed it's stucks one place, so you must close app and reopen for another code.
Excellent App with out any ads , works soo flawless on my Samsung note, , great job..
Great qr scanner, open source so safe!
Very easy to use and I there are no ads!
didn't work on pixel 2xl. has permissions granted, but won't scan a barcode.
No nonsense QR app. Minimal permissions.
Can't hit back after scanning. Everything just freezes. Did anyone test the update?
need to update the spiel to explain the new permissions requested since low permissions is the USP of this app!
QR generator: the 'Store' button doesn't store the qr code in the Galery. No file is created.
Cool,but there are problems. If you generate a qr code why can't you read it from a picture inside the device? also, why no zoom and where are the generated codes stored?
I loved it but after update v3.0 it doesn't start. Uninstall and back to v2.2.1
good idea but it does nothing. pity. Galaxy A8 2018 andoid 9. i click proceed>search on web and it opens the photo gallery.

I like the privacy focus, but the app lacks one core functionality any QR scanner needs: Copying the scanned value without a hassle. Currently, it requires a lot of unnecessary tapping, when the value could just as easily be copied automatically (as a setting to be enabled). This unfortunately makes this app not very comfortable to use.

An app that does what it needs to -- scans QR codes. Love that it only uses the camera and doesn't request access to everything in order to sell my life information to marketers. Wish more developers took this approach!
Possibly the best QR scanner ever. Not because of what it does but because of what it doesnt do. Not spyware. not adware. not exposing you needlessly.
Might be good, I don't know. My options are to open the link and save or don't open the link and don't save. I don't want to "save" anything. I just want to open a stupid link.
Does what it says on the tin. Doesn't require the keys to your life to operate. Just camera access, as it should be. Thanks!
Perfect, simple qr scanning app
As others note, only minimal permissions are required and it reads QR codes.  I don't know why this hasn't got better ratings.
QUICK, Free NO Ads free of spyware. 5 Stars.

Sorry, app is jolly good, but unfortunately upon installation it makes another app crash: Mobile Manager, scanning "Privacy & Security". Same for other apps of this Author. Asus Zenfone 2, Android 5.0. Thank You anyway for Your commitment and best regards.
doesn't work with my LG G5. stuck focusing and defocusing end.essly

It's nice to be able to see the code to check that it really is privacy 
friendly,

Works as advertised! Simple and easy to use. After scanning, the app shows 
you the URL and asks if you think it's safe before it will navigate to the 
site. Slick! Thank you!
Only ðŸ“· Permission needed
Works well and with minimal permissions. Perfect!
Just works
Really like that the app requests only camera permission
Love it! Ad free, privacy minded, and the code is up on github. Thanks!!
Functionality is satisfactory and permission requirements is perfectly to the very minimum.
Best app for reading QR codes. Does not need any permission except camera access. Thanks alot SECUSO
The app scans the codes and gives me options to search on the web, non of the options is a web browser!

This app is well designed, simple to use, and does exactly what it says it will do with minimum permissions. I wish more developers would produce apps following that ethos. Thanks for taking the time to build this.

Samsung J5 phone. After scan it offers to find product on web. Just for reason it opens phone book or phone setings window pops out. It looks unusual for searh in settings. Or it is unsafe. Think by your self.
No ads! No extraneous permissions! Danke sehr, Tech Uni Darmstadt!
It respects privacy .
Best QR code scanner if you're looking for one that doesn't require mysterious and unnecessary permissions. Thanks guys!
No unnecessary permissions, and does the job. What more do you want? Thanks Secuso.
Nice app that doesn't connect to the internet.
Thanks to the SECUSO group for creating practical, privacy friendly apps that are free and open source.
Keeps showing "Android Camera encountered an error" on my 7.1.1 Nexus 6P. And doesn't work. Otherwise a good privacy-aware app.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for commenting. We have just fixed the mentioned problem in Privacy Friendly QR Scanner 1.6.1
